App.summary: SwiftUI app composition, views, DI, services, models, and resources.

AudioKitEncorely.summary: Audio DSP utilities (RMS/FFT) and audio session helpers using AudioKit.

MCPClient.summary: Socket.IO client and protocol integration for external services.

SharedTypes.summary: Cross-module data models, typealiases, and shared structs.

GlassUI.summary: Reusable SwiftUI components and visual elements.

Domain.summary: Local SPM package for domain logic. No tests defined in manifest.

Config.summary: Build settings, entitlements, and plist configuration.

Tests.summary: Unit tests for audio and other modules.
